name: Vijnana Suffusion
description:
When the character to which this is attached uses a Charged Attack: Their Physical DMG dealt will be converted to Dendro DMG and after the Skill DMG is finalized, summon 1 Clusterbloom Arrow.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a $[K51]: </color>Their $[K100] dealt will be converted to $[K107] and after the Skill DMG is finalized, summon 1 $[K1008].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
